com.ooyala.android.ui

Class OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.ui.AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
      • com.ooyala.android.ui.OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LayoutController

    public class OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
extends com.ooyala.android.ui.AbstractOoyalaPlayerLayoutController
    This LayoutController is a faster LayoutController that will work only on one specific case: The OoyalaPlayerLayout it controls is a direct child of the Activity's base layout which is a FrameLayout. This LayoutController uses basic controls and allows additional overlays to be added. Fullscreening is done by simply resizing the OoyalaPlayerLayout to fill the entire screen, which does not trigger a player reload thus causing this to be much faster at Fullscreening than OoyalaPlayerLayoutController.

    • Nested Class Summary
